stories.title: 8 backcountry skiers found dead and 1 still missing after California avalanche
stories.summary: Authorities say the bodies of eight backcountry skiers have been found and one remains missing after an avalanche near Lake Tahoe in California. Six others were found alive.

stories.title: Trump says UK’s Starmer making ‘a big mistake’ with Chagos Islands deal
stories.summary: The US president warned the military base on Diego Garcia may be needed to respond to possible attack from Iran.

stories.title: WATCH:  U.S.-mediated Ukraine-Russia peace talks in Geneva end after just two hours
stories.summary: ABC News' Patrick Reevell reports that there is still a "fundamental gap between the two sides over territory," specifically Ukraine's eastern Donbas region.
